verbs.description: Israeli leaders and [ARG2: a US delegation] [V: including] [ARG1: Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin and President Donald Trump 's daughter and son - in - law , Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner] , were due to attend the opening of the embassy .
